location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'A Map of the Northern Frontier of Khorassan with parts of Irak & Mazandar√°n to illustrate Reports by Captain the Hon. G. Napier On Special Duty in Persia'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper.Dimensions: 650 x 960mm, on a sheet 680 x 1000mm.

mods.abstract: 'Prepared by order of Her Majesty's Secretary of State for India. 1876. Scale 16 Miles to 1 Inch.This map is a part of Capt. O. B. St John's Map of Persia, with alterations and additions by Capt. Napier.'Printing statement: 'Trel. Saunders'.
